item.description:
We'll meet for a low-key lunch/brunch to meet new people and reconnect with ones we've met before!

If people are game, we can go bowling at King's Back Bay after our meal.

Fire & Ice is an improvisational grill - where you load up on the ingredients, and chefs cook your meal for you on a large grill. (For vegetarians - there is a separate grill).

Check out Fire & Ice's website: http://www.fire-ice.c...

See you Sunday!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting near the door.
item.name: Brunch/Lunch at Fire & Ice... followed by bowling
